data.title: Chat Application
data.subtitle: Building realtime chat application server and client
goals: Send and receive message through group chat
data.how: Create new user and join to group chat. Then just type the message and will receive realtime another messages.

data.title: Portofolio Web
data.subtitle: Using Vue and Bulma for CSS Framework
data.how: It shows Single Page Application dynamically.

data.title: River Monitoring
data.subtitle: Building river monitoring IoT which is connected to IoT Application Dashboard.
goals: Monitor quality parameter of river through network
Measure quality parameter of river such as pH, Turbidity, Conductivity, and Temperature
data.how: Measurement system will gather all information of river through sensor. Then, Arduino will send data to network through GPRS Module. Last, the IoT Dashboard will deliver information about the river quality parameter.
